title: My Favorite Murder Presents: I Saw What You Did - Episode 1: Esteemed Dirtbags
description:
My Favorite Murder presents the first episode of I Saw What You Did where Millie and Danielle talk about THE HONEYMOON KILLERS (1970) and HEAVENLY CREATURES (1994), and Danielle's grandmother explains the life lessons we can learn from horror movies.

Listen and subscribe to I Saw What You Did on Apple Podcasts, Stitcher, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
